storyInfo: Stitch and the design representative argue with each other about their design philosophies. Eunectes's attitude towards Durin machinery attracts the attention of the industry representative, and Avdotya slowly opens up to Gavial.

attributes.content: I feel... New. Complete.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Hahaha, you can stop circling me now, little fella. I'm just as happy to see you good as new.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Zumama: skilled at overhauls.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Zumama, requesting favor. Small favor.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: 0428, partner: already retired. No longer responding to communication. Requesting assistance.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Shipped along with this machine, built in the same factory. Now, no longer responding.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: No longer responding?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Don't worry. Take me to see it.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Zumama, this way.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: These components, and this design... Hmm, might be a bit more complicated than routine maintenance.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: How does this thing work? And what's this component for? It's nothing like Lancet, and I don't think Closure has ever said anything about these.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: If I connect it here... No, I should be more careful. This is your friend after all, right?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Friend? Zumama has described this relationship several times. But I do not understand it.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Repair cannot be performed?
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: If only I had some information to work from...
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Information? The library, preserves information.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Can you take me there?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Assisting in navigation is my glorious mission. Zumama, this way please.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Now that's something you don't see every day.
attributes.name: Durin Passerby

attributes.content: I've never heard of anything like that in the books. Surface-dwellers are worth looking into.
attributes.name: Durin Passerby

attributes.content: Elysium, let's have a little race to see who can fly out face-first from the super spinny slide the fastest. How about it?
attributes.name: Inebriated Durin
Elysium
attributes.content: Hah, you're about to see why they call me Rhodes Island's Legendary Aqua-Man!

attributes.name: Elysium
attributes.content: Thorns has nothing on me when it comes to this game!
attributes.joined: Hah, you're about to see why they call me Rhodes Island's Legendary Aqua-Man!Thorns has nothing on me when it comes to this game!

attributes.content: I'll be honest here. I don't have the slightest bit of interest in hanging out with you. I'd rather be eaten by one of the gloompincers in that damned Acahuallan jungle.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Don't be like that, Stitch. I just want to hear your opinion.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Regardless of what the people of Zeruertza think, I know who's truly worth their mettle in this town – and that includes both you and your teacher. You've earned it.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: I've never seen anything like Zeruertza's breathtaking dome in any piece of Durin architectural literature. If you could...
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: If that's what you want to talk to me about, I suggest we stop here before wasting any more of each other's time.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I know you're not so into my Great Aquapit's design. Same goes for the slide, and the fountain. None of them are exactly masterpieces.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: But, Stitch, do you know what is I really want to design? Same as you, the dome right over our heads! We were competing over it for the longest time!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Haha, you've got some nerve saying that to my face. Are you trying to pick a fight?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: You and I make good rivals.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Hah! Good rivals? You sure think highly of me. Should we hug it out? Put our arms around each other and weep?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I'm serious, Stitch.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: I just want to know. Why did you give up on the dome renovation project a few years ago?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: You stopped submitting your designs to the referendums. You just quit. You couldn't have given up trying to win people over to your aesthetic?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Were you really fine with Master Finch's unannounced farewell? He's still your...
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Stop talking down to me, Catch!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I just got bored. Tired of it all. Simple as that.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I got fed up with trying to pin all my ambitions on this broken dome, and trying to get the people here to vote for me.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I got fed up with peddling solutions against 'architects with dreams' like you. It's all completely pointless!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Listen up. That piece of junk over our heads, I don't care if it leaks or explodes or even if you vote to tear it down one day––
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I don't give a damn anymore. So do whatever the hell you want with it!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: But that dome is your teacher's...
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace
Stitch Canvas
attributes.content: I'll say it again.

attributes.name: Stitch Canvas
attributes.content: I!

attributes.name: Stitch Canvas
attributes.content: Don't!

attributes.name: Stitch Canvas
attributes.content: Give!

attributes.name: Stitch Canvas
attributes.content: A!

attributes.name: Stitch Canvas
attributes.content: Damn!
*sigh*... Alright.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Stitch, I wanted to ask you to work with me. The two of us could've come up with a brand-new plan for the dome, which I'm sure the vast majority of people here would've agreed to.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: But since you don't care about the dome anymore, I won't push you. I respect your decision.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: But, could you give me a moment of your time and offer me some feedback about my ideas for renovating the dome? I'd like your advice as well.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: I don't care–– Actually, let's just hear it first.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Really? I appreciate it!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: First, I think the whole thing should be more colorful.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Intricate geometric patterns can greatly add to the beauty of the dome, just like stained glass!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: The juxtaposition of yellow, green, red, and blue! We'll let the citizens of Zeruertza know a new kind of beauty when they cast their eyes up!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Day or night, the new dome will become the singular focal point of everyone's attention! It'll be the safe harbor everyone comes back to in their search for peace of mind!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: A great, dazzling gemstone!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: What do you think? From my perspective, it's a brilliant, innovative design. I'm really proud of it. But I'm ready to take your feedback seriously.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Catch.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Had a change of heart already? Then, we'll be partners...
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: You're not laying a single finger on the dome. I'm going to do everything in my power to stop you.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Didn't you just say you didn't give a damn anymore, and I could do whatever I want?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: I thought you just wanted to resurrect that shambling corpse. Or put it to rest permanently. That, I don't care about.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: But I will not allow you to desecrate it in this manner!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Huh? This is entirely a product of my respect for the dome.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: No. No way in hell. I swear I'm going to beat that idea out of your head!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Maintenance materials, library. Location: Sorted Archives, Area 59. Available bookshelf.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Is this the place?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Affirmative.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Let me see... Hm, is this Durin text? I can't read it at all.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Reading. Book titles: 'The Durin: To the Surface and Back Again' and 'Fine Durin Liquor: 127 Commonly-Seen Brewing Methods.'
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Continuing search. New hits: 'Believe It Or Not! Super Crazy Durin Masterplans' 'Research on Cybernetics Information Theory Based on the Influence of Social Behavior'....
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Little fella, are you sure they have what we're looking for here?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Probability: 42.377%. Durins rarely organize things.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Hmm, I can read some of the words over here.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: The issues of 'Stranger Things' on these three bookshelves are more than ten years old. This row is for Victorian books... and you even have Kazimierz's 'The Red Wine'?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: We use them to learn different languages, cultures, and news from the surface.
attributes.name: Durin Passerby

attributes.content: I see. No wonder why there's hardly any communication barrier between us.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Is this a Durin-published magazine? 'Breaking News! Attack of the Self-Driving Cart!', order one magazine and get a prototype for free... So that's what all those gadgets zipping around outside are?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Croque seriously pushed her cart modification business, and sold those add-on booster packs throughout Zeruertza.
attributes.name: Durin Passerby

attributes.content: She said, 'everyone likes a bit of randomness,' but I don't really get it.
attributes.name: Durin Passerby

attributes.content: But why is this in Sargonian?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: In order to carry on the fine tradition of 'Stranger Things,' we decided that our own magazine should also be in Sargonian! It's how Durins think.
attributes.name: Durin Passerby

attributes.content: Are you looking for this book? 'Build Your Own Assistant Robot in 3 Seconds.'
attributes.name: Durin Passerby

attributes.content: That sounds like it could come in handy. Thank you.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Deculture! 0429 says hello!
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: You two know each other?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Hello, allow me to introduce myself. I am Deculture Silvermint, the industry representative of Zeruertza.
attributes.name: Durin Passerby

attributes.content: And also administrator of the assistant robots.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: The administrator...
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: That's right. The assistant robots in Zeruertza are built, supervised, and governed by me.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Model R3-E3 Assistant Robot #0429, what are you doing here?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: This unit, submitted a request to Zumama. Overhaul 0428.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: 0428 has already been retired. Now return to your post.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: ...Acknowledged. Executing directive.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Zumama, your communication with that assistant robot is pretty unusual, and its responses have been... abnormal.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: What's unusual about our communication?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I can't say for sure. Maybe what's unusual is... the communication itself?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: You don't talk to the little fellas?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: No... They were made just to work.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: That's no good. I talk to my Lancet all the time. She's like a big sister to me, letting me lean up against her cold, metal shell, patting me on the shoulder with her robotic arm, singing to me with her beautiful synth...
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: 'Stranger Things' never mentioned anything like that.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Hehe, that was worth the trip!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I wasn't able to find the right outfit, but these little trinkets are awesome! Ores I've never seen before, these strange metal wind chimes, as well as these cute little pendants...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: And most importantly! Gavial helped me pick this out...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: The only thing that could be better is if Gavial bought a matching set with me!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Is she alright?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Oh, yeah, it's fine. The kid's been like that ever since she was little.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I've read that this obsessive hoarding behavior is called 'Zalak's Disease' in some places. It might be stress-induced or something.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: No, no, I'm really happy! These memories are very precious to me!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Okay, if you say so.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: So, Avdotya, you have an Ursus name. Is that where you came from originally?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: My name is Avdotya Razorpen. A standard Durin name.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: But, Avdotya is still Ursine.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: What are you getting at?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Calm down, I'm just making small talk.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: No... that place is not my home. I just happened to come from there.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: What I really don't understand is why you're so paranoid about the surface.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: When I was little, I loved spending time with the grammar tutor my parents hired for me. Though she could be a bit dry, she sometimes said really interesting things.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Ursus has a lot of literature describing one's hometown, and my tutor was always entranced by those works. We would analyze their motifs, their composition styles...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Back then, I thought everyone would grow nostalgic for their hometown, and people who traveled far away would eventually find their way back to slumber eternally...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: But I later found out that's not true at all. If all the memories you have of your hometown are painful ones, and you find a place more suitable to be your home, then why should you yearn for a place you once were?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: It is no different from another stop on a long journey.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Miss Avdotya, what made you decide to leave Ursus?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: ...I don't want to talk about it.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Things that would make you vomit. My status, my family, my friends, all vanished overnight. I fled with my tail between my legs, quite literally.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: From Ursus, to Sargon, to an underground Durin city... Your journey couldn't have been easy.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: How could there be a journey with no destination?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I just happened to get lucky. I finally found this place, a small city called Zeruertza.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: The Durins here accepted me, and I will repay the debt with even greater kindness.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: This is the place I've decided I belong.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: And that's why I won't let anything harm them. I don't care if it's out of malice, or out of good intentions gone awry.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: That is my warning to you.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I was going to ask you to have a drink, just as a show of goodwill. But maybe not––
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: That isn't off the table.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: ––Ahhh.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Yeah. The way you drink definitely screams Ursus.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Shut up. Durins drink the same way.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: To be honest, I'm not much of a psychologist. There are a lot of things I don't understand about the human heart, and I don't really care to understand it. It's already hard enough patching up the body.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But what I can say is, you can never really become a Durin, no matter how much you act like one.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I don't think we know each other well enough to start picking out each others' problems.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I overheard you talking with some of those Durin shopkeepers. The gist I got was that the stories you wrote about snowfields didn't seem to strike the right note with them.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: That's right... They have neither snow nor fields underground.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Just to be clear, I don't write like that because I miss being there. It's nothing more than... a plot of land for a story to take place on.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: You know that there's a story to be told there. That by itself isn't Durin.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Some scars can't be covered up after all.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: But that won't stop me from trying.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Even if you just be yourself, the Durins will still accept you.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: What if I want a new self?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Fine.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Sure, the Durins are always happy to accept anyone they meet. This time, it was you people, and me. What about next time?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Since you are a doctor, you must have seen the evil lurking in men's hearts. You've surely seen the depravity to which people will stoop in order to hurt one another.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I won't act like this is a racial issue. Everything on the surface has shaped us into this. All too quick to resort to violence, lusting after power and money, blinded by ambition...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I used to be soaked in it. Now, I want a new self.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Evil is contagious, and can be learned. The people underground have never experienced it, and have no resistance to evil.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: You're right, I can't become a Durin. But for the sake of the people of Zeruertza, I am willing to do everything in my power to protect it.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: ––I will protect this idyllic, unspoiled innocence.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Didn't you say before that the Durins can handle their own problems?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Stop using my own words against me!
attributes.name: Avdotya
